original_text: The priest is to sacrifice them, the one for a sin offering and the other for a burnt offering. In this way he will make atonement before the Lord for the man because of his discharge.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 한 마리는 속죄제로, 다른 한 마리는 번제로 드려 그의 유출병으로 말미암아 여호와 앞에서 속죄할지니라

sentences.original_text: The priest is to sacrifice them
the one for a sin offering
and the other for a burnt offering
In this way he will make atonement
before the Lord for the man
